capability.name: Financialmarketanalysis
capability.definition: Provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research
capability.role: Analyze available sources of internal and external financial market information and research to develop insights and opinions on any aspect of financial market activity and pricing
capability.example: A competitor financial pricing analysis is requested for a company issuing corporate paper

key_features.name: Identify sources of financial market research
key_features.description: Enables identify sources of financial market research to support provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research

key_features.name: Select appropriate analytical algorithms/hypotheses to apply
key_features.description: Enables select appropriate analytical algorithms/hypotheses to apply to support provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research

key_features.name: Consolidate information and apply/refine algorithms
key_features.description: Enables consolidate information and apply/refine algorithms to support provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research

key_features.name: Interpret and present analytical insights
key_features.description: Enables interpret and present analytical insights to support provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research
